title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.8 - Financial provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.8 - Financial provisions

State Regulations
(a) Each
local government receiving an achievement award shall deposit the amount of the
award in a trust and agency account. (b) Unless an extension is granted by the
selection committee, all scholarship funds shall be expended no later than six
years from June 30th following receipt of the funds. (c) All scholarship funds not expended within
the period provided in section
810.8
(b) of this

Part shall be returned to the Office for Local Government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
810.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
